participant_1.background:
I enjoy running and skateboarding to stay active and clear my head.
i prefer vinyl records to any other music recording format.
I get to work on a new project every day with the love of my life.
i wish my boyfriend didn t want an open relationship.
I like to take my time driving through the countryside and listening to music.

participant_2.background:
I'd rather read my horoscope and write my own poems, thank you very much.
i love to paint pictures.
i can type 140 words per minute.
i grew up in the projects of chicago.
I like to go for long walks in the park with a cup of coffee in hand on the weekend.

content.text: I'm doing great! How about you?
I'm doing well, thank you! I love that you're a painter! I'm a musician, but I wish I could paint as well.
That's awesome! What kind of music do you play?
I play the drums and I sing. I'm in a band with my boyfriend.
That's so cool! I've always wanted to be in a band. What's your favorite song to play?
That's awesome! We're called "The Moonshine Bandits." My favorite song to play is "Crazy Train" by Ozzy Osbourne.
That's a great song! I love Ozzy Osbourne. He's one of my favorite musicians.
Me too! He's an amazing performer. What's your favorite thing about painting?
I love the way I can express myself creatively. I can paint anything I want and it's my own personal interpretation.
That's a great way to look at it! I love that you can express yourself through your art
